sentences.simplifiedText: 面对压力，你必须要学会冷静下来，然后才能找到解决的方法。
sentences.traditionalText: 面對壓力，你必須要學會冷靜下來，然後才能找到解決的方法。
sentences.pinyin: Miàn duì yālì, nǐ bìxū yào xuéhuì lěngjìng xiàlái, ránhòu cáinéng zhǎodào jiějué de fāngfǎ.
sentences.translation: Faced with pressure, you must learn to calm down before you can find a solution.
